Lyric:
[by:拉比克大魔王]
[00:27.040]I feel like I'm losing hope 
[00:30.410]In my body and my soul 
[00:32.770]And the sky, it looks so ominous 
[00:40.030]And as time comes to a halt 
[00:43.020]Silence starts to overflow 
[00:45.780]My cries are inconspicuous 
[00:51.790]Tell me God, are you punishing me? 
[00:58.700]Is this the price I'm paying for my past mistakes? 
[01:05.680]This is my redemption song 
[01:11.590]I need you more than ever right now 
[01:17.620]Can you hear me now? 
[01:21.090]Cause we're going to shout it loud 
[01:24.520]Even if our word seem meaningless
[01:27.940]It's like I'm carrying the weight of the world 
[01:34.410]I wish that someway, somehow 
[01:37.560]That I can save every one of us 
[01:40.880]But the truth is that I'm only one girl 
[01:46.980]Maybe if I keep believing my dreams will come to life 
[01:56.520]Come to life... 
[02:13.700]After all the laughter fades 
[02:17.240]Signs of life all washed away 
[02:19.780]I can still, still feel a gentle breeze 
[02:27.120]No matter how hard I pray 
[02:30.080]Signs of warning still remain 
[02:32.580]And life has become my enemy 
[02:38.910]Tell me God, are you punishing me? 
[02:45.790]Is this the price I'm paying for my past mistakes? 
[02:52.660]This is my redemption song 
[02:58.740]I need you more than ever right now 
[03:04.790]Can you hear me now? 
[03:08.420]Cause we're going to shout it loud 
[03:11.540]Even if our word seem meaningless
[03:14.870]It's like I'm carrying the weight of the world 
[03:21.240]I wish that someway, somehow 
[03:24.490]That I can save every one of us 
[03:27.980]But the truth is that I'm only one girl 
[03:33.900]Maybe if I keep believing my dreams will come to life 
[03:43.360]Come to life... 
[04:15.300]Cause we're going to shout it loud 
[04:19.810]Even if our word seem meaningless
[04:23.370]It's like I'm carrying the weight of the world 
[04:29.370]I wish that someway, somehow 
[04:32.730]That I can save every one of us 
[04:35.980]But the truth is that I'm only one girl 
[04:42.600]Still, we're going to shout it loud 
[04:45.770]Even if our word seem meaningless
[04:49.100]It's like I'm carrying the weight of the world 
[04:55.300]I hope that someway, somehow 
[04:58.300]That I can save every one of us 
[05:02.060]But the truth is that I'm only one girl 
[05:07.800]Maybe if I keep believing my dreams will come to life 
[05:19.300]Come to life...
